name: Rooster's Crow Coffee Roastery
good_review_summary: This place sells coffee beans, and is a full cafe. They serve all of the coffee shop favorite drinks and pastries. The staff was helpful and friendly, and the inside (and outside patio) looked clean and well organized.
bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Honest Coffee Roasters
good_review_summary: The food was delicious, but the portion size of both the vegan hash and the granola bowl were very small compared to expectations. The acai bowls ordered by another table looked like the expected volume for a breakfast entree.
bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Gold Sprint
good_review_summary: Gold Sprint Coffee in Huntsville offers a charming ambiance with ample parking and a lovely patio area. While the coffee shop excels in atmosphere, the Lavender Honey Latte was somewhat disappointing, lacking the bold flavors.
bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Just Love Coffee Cafe - Huntsville
good_review_summary: Just Love Coffee Cafe is located in a complex that was once home to the Huntsville Times. The restaurant is comfortable and cozy, with a Post-It note artwork gallery at the register.
bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Angel's Island Coffee
good_review_summary: Coffee from Angels is some of the best in Huntsville. The cafe is always clean, including the bathrooms. The milkshakes were honestly the best I've ever tasted.
bad_review_summary: Large brewed coffee ($4.36) was okay; lite bitterness, no acidity. Bakery offerings looked good, but also look like they were purchased from a large box store.

name: Olde Towne Coffee Shoppe
good_review_summary: I ended up ordering a bagel with strawberry cream cheese and a plain latte with oat milk. There's a lot of options for such a small shop, even coconut water which is perfect for summer! All the food was great, didn't get to try the coffee or tea this go but will next time.
bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: The Standard Social Market
good_review_summary: The food was so good!! Such a cute place for a brunch with friends or family. The music selection was nice, a tad loud, but I think that was because we were directly under a set of speakers. French toast and burrito were both flavorful and filling.
bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Am√©lie Coffee Shop
good_review_summary: The crab cake is probably the best I've ever had outside of Maryland. The wine selection was varied and really thought out. The crustini's were cooked perfectly and it was plenty of food.
bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: The Greenroom Coffee Shop at The Camp
good_review_summary: The Greenroom has a great location and unique menu. They also offer a variety of house coffees from Columbia and Guatemala. King cakes are available in latte and cake form.
bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Turbo Coffee
good_review_summary: The baristas are some of the kindest people you will ever encounter. The manager took time out of her busy shift to wipe down my table before I began working on some homework. The coffee is top notch as well. Will be returning!
bad_review_summary: Turbo Coffee has changed the way it serves bagels. The bagel is now more like a biscuit with bagel seasoning. We won't be coming back unless the bagels that you used to serve are brought back.

name: Charlie Foster's Espresso + Wine Bar
good_review_summary: Logan and Imon take such great care of us every time we come in. You have to get the brown sugar shaken espresso and the breakfast sandwich on a croissant. It‚Äôs also an espresso wine bar so you can come for breakfast and then come back for a night cap and some wine.
bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Bus Stop Coffee
good_review_summary: Bus Stop Coffee in Huntsville, Alabama offers a delightful experience that I thoroughly enjoyed. The atmosphere exudes coziness, making it a perfect spot for a relaxing break. I highly recommend stopping in for a coffee and snack.
bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Flint River Coffee Company
good_review_summary: The staff was incredibly friendly, the location is easy to get to, and the atmosphere is cozy and inviting. The Pumpkin Latte and and the gourmet grilled cheese were good. The Blueberry Scones are a MUST for any pastry lovers.
bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Hatch: Coffee With a Purpose
good_review_summary: Huntsville's own Chef Ruth Mercado is behind the menu. The cafe is located in the South Huntsville public library. There is also a makerspace and Friends used book store on site.
bad_review_summary: Used to love Hatch and their yummy breakfast sandwiches. Will stop eating there now because the last three times I‚Äôve ordered the food has been a very different quality. The turkey sausage has become so small is only covers a fourth of the regular sized bagel.

name: Beignets & Brew
good_review_summary: Beignets & Brew is an adorable little shop just outside the Redstone Arsenal Visitors Center. They have a drive-thru, walk-up window, and online order page, as well as an outdoor patio area.
bad_review_summary: Beignets are good, service is horrible. Waited in line with one car in front of us for 20 minutes before even being able to order. They need more help working and better customer service.

name: Caf√© USgumaut
good_review_summary: Great food, great staff, and a great place to have breakfast or lunch. The roast beef is my favorite! They also have an amazing selection of breakfast foods and deserts.
bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Parlor Doughnuts
address: 2500 Clinton Ave W suite b, Huntsville
good_review_summary: Parlor doughnuts was a pleasant surprise. The atmosphere is clean, quiet & relaxed as well as a bit plain. The online order and pickup process was a breeze.
bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: 7 Brew Coffee
good_review_summary: I come here almost every day, they have the best coffee and customer service! I‚Äôve never had a bad experience with any of the workers here. They are amazing and so friendly whether it‚Äôs rain or shine.
bad_review_summary: I love 7Brew coffee... However, recently the wait time at this location has become absolutely terrible. The employees are wonderful and friendly but they need to move with a purpose to get orders out quickly. They need to remove the curb blocking us in, and give customers the ability to leave if the wait is too long.

name: The Grid: Food Trucks, Farmers Market, Event Venue, Coffee Shop, Bakery
address: 211 SE Taylor Rd, Owens Cross Roads
good_review_summary: Rocken is a great location and a cute little area. Currently this is a venue for a Saturday farmers market and a Mexican food truck. Eventually the coffee shop there will open with the possibility for a deck with live music.
bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Just Love Coffee Cafe- Bailey Cove
address: 7900 Bailey Cove Rd SE suite v, Huntsville
good_review_summary: I got a white chocolate tiramisu as a frappe. It‚Äôs been a while for me, but it honestly didn‚Äôt taste the same as the ones we used to make over at the Memorial location (I‚Äôm a former employee) The recipe could have very well changed too. It still tasted alright though, just not as good as before.
bad_review_summary: The franchise hasn‚Äôt even posted on Twitter since 2018. I‚Äôd recommend just the coffee from this place, but save the money and just eat the butt of the bread at home. The coffee was amazing but I wish I never bought this. I would‚Äôve rather gone to Subway and eaten two meals then had this.

name: Starbucks
good_review_summary: Starbuck's is one of the better stores in the area customer service wise. I got a lavender oat milk iced latte and they guy accidentally made two and gave me both! I was so excited I practically skipped out of the store.
bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Starbucks
good_review_summary: The staff at this location were patient and kind. I‚Äôve sadly been to other Starbucks locations that definitely lacked in customer service unlike this location.
bad_review_summary: I was here to pick up an online order. I got a notification that my order should‚Äôve been done, but it was another 10 minutes until I got my order. While waiting, the manager, Aubrey, was rude to me, another customer, and raising her voice at employees in front of customers. This behavior will lose traffic heavily for this location.

name: Starbucks
good_review_summary: The coffee is perfect, the service is good, and food is always yummy! Exceptional friendly service, they are notably efficient, thus far the best Starbucks in this area that consistently prepares drinks correctly.
bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Starbucks
good_review_summary: I don‚Äôt go to Starbucks often, and as such, am not extremely familiar with the menu. I wanted to get a delicious coffee for my birthday and I thought to myself ‚ÄúWhy not Starbucks?!‚Äù The Barista there that made my birthday drink, Sarah, was really nice! I would highly recommend checking out this store if you're thinking about it!
bad_review_summary: The staff had zero customer service skills‚Äîjust a condescending attitude and a complete lack of common sense. Since when is it a crime to stand in line for 30 seconds while deciding what to get?

name: Starbucks
good_review_summary: I just have to say thank you to the amazing people working at the MidCity Starbucks. I have to keep my caffeine intake low due to a heart condition so I‚Äôm one of the weirdos getting decaf first thing in the morning lol. But they have always been perfect and I can still enjoy my morning coffee thanks to y‚Äôall!
bad_review_summary: I ordered a black coffee with caramel drizzle. I would clearly see the thick caramel at the bottom of the cup if it was in there. I have never felt so dismissed and disrespected EVER in a fast food place. I understand everyone has bad days but teach your employees customer service every time or stick them in the back.

name: Starbucks
good_review_summary: The staff at this Starbucks are definitely worth Five Stars. The employees are the best I've ever had the pleasure to get coffee from. Always cheerful and considerate. Great job Five Star Staff.
bad_review_summary: If you advertise you close at 8:30 that‚Äôs when you should close. This is the THIRD time coming at least ten minutes before close and them not taking orders. Change the hours online to what you‚Äôre actually working.

name: Starbucks
good_review_summary: Yummy Carmel Apple latte! Service was great, smiling faces, there was a long line but that's to be expected at a Starbucks lol. Location is right bear the door so its a little odd to sit and relax, but the service totally makes up for it.
bad_review_summary: My drink was good but my Mom's drink was white. I would have complained more but the staff was so rude. I usually love this place but every time I go there it's a terrible experience.

name: Starbucks
good_review_summary: The parking is usually a pain, and there's no drive thru. The staff was friendly and helpful, and everything seemed clean and organized. Would go again.
bad_review_summary: Employees ignored me, even though they clearly saw me. Posted business hours are closing at 8:30pm. on 5/26/25 I went at 7:00pm and the doors were locked.

name: Starbucks
good_review_summary: This is usually my go to Starbucks because of the convenience. The drive through usually takes 10/15 mins but at least it‚Äôs spacious unlike the one on governors. The parking lot has plenty of room and usually is fairly empty. My drink is made correctly 9 out of 10 times.
bad_review_summary: Almost always understaffed-- they frequently close the indoor cafe for multiple days in a row. Will be there studying for about an hour only to be told they are closing six hours earlier than their store hours.

name: Starbucks
address: 2750 Carl T Jones Dr SE, Huntsville
good_review_summary: The hours listed are incorrect. They share the same hours as Target which means they don't open until 8 am during the week, not 5 am. The coffee is consistent and the employees seem to be happy to be there.
bad_review_summary: The young woman that took my order asked me ‚Äúhot or iced?‚Äù i said iced, once i received my drink from the other barista i realized that the drink was hot so i said ‚Äúim sorry, i asked for iced.‚Äù The other girl starts yelling ‚Äúoh my goddddd‚Äù as i walked out of the building. I am appalled by the rudeness of this young woman. She shouldn‚Äôt not be

name: Starbucks
good_review_summary: This Starbucks is my favorite location in Huntsville! It is beautiful, and the staff is the best. People complaining should try making hundreds of coffees and not make any mistakes.
bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Starbucks
good_review_summary: Great location next to Big Spring Park. Tons of seating. Outstanding service. This one is super nice inside! Great location.
bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Starbucks
address: 114 Heart of Huntsville Dr SW, Huntsville
good_review_summary: No good reviews available.
bad_review_summary: The customer service here is great. However... I'm not coming back to this one. Drive through is completely disrespectful. We asked for ice in our ICED COFFEE. After being pulled to the front. They young man walked out a coffee packed with ice to be ignorant. Do better.

name: Starbucks
address: 201 Governors Dr SW First Floor, Huntsville
good_review_summary: CNN.com will feature iReporter photos in a weekly Travel Snapshots gallery. Please submit your best shots of New York for next week. Visit CNN.com/Travel next Wednesday for a new gallery of snapshots.
bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Barnes and Noble Caf√©
good_review_summary: B&N has a wide range of books and merchandise, such as Lego, Calico Critters (or Sylvanian Families, as they are known where I come from). There is a Starbucks inside for my coffee fix.
bad_review_summary: I hope no one comes here with a service dog, the staff member was rude, we where told to leave that dogs are not allowed in, and would not let me explain that she is a serviceDog just that we needed to leave right then no exceptions. It was humiliating. Won't be back here again.

name: PJ's Coffee
good_review_summary: First time at this location & it was a great experience! We had the mini beignets with chocolate & strawberry dip. Turkey sausage sandwich & a regular sausage sandwich. We had pralines & cream coffee & a white chocolate mocha coffee. All of it we spent about $40.
bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: PJ's Coffee
good_review_summary: Beignets are served warm every time I have ordered. There is a wait for a few minutes to get your order because it is made fresh to order. Staff is very friendly as well.
bad_review_summary: The lady that "helped" me wasn't very helpful, if somebody asks about a drink you guys don't have you should be able to recommend something similar instead of just saying no. She didn't come up to the window for a few minutes after I pulled up. Her whole attitude was very off putting and made the experience feel like it was an inconvenience to her.

name: Scooter's Coffee
good_review_summary: Scooters is one of my new favorite places. Their options are on their menu, I am enjoying getting familiar with. The prices are reasonable, the staff is friendly, and it's not a super long wait.
bad_review_summary: A blended caramelicious should actually taste like coffee and caramel not sugar water. Please make sure you‚Äôre putting enough flavor. And when we ask for extra caramel actually do it! It‚Äôs not that hard if you actually care to listen.

name: Dunkin'
good_review_summary: The service was great, but the coffee, not so much. I buy the same coffee Monday thru Friday at my local Dunkin and love it! However this one isn't very good at all.
bad_review_summary: I asked for a large iced coffee light ice and I ask for light ice so I can have more coffee and less ice cause they love to over fill the cup with mostly ice. Like yall need to do better and I never have problems with this location til this new management came along. Where is corporate at? If this is a franchise it should be taken away.

name: Dunkin'
good_review_summary: Wade, Zoe, and Ethan did a phenomenal job! Even though they were short staffed and super busy, they seem to make the business work together. 10 out of 10 definitely will recommend!
bad_review_summary: Placed an online order at 11:55am in the parking lot, it's now 12:16pm I just got my drink but I still do not have my food. The cook will not change her gloves after touching the computer then everyone's hot food. I watched 3 Crossiant sandwich get made after already waiting 5 minutes and now they can not make my sandwich correctly due to serving drive thru first and no longer having crossiants.

name: Dunkin'
address: 2785 Carl T Jones Dr SE Suite A, Huntsville
good_review_summary: I had forgotten my wallet one morning, and I was determined just to not get my coffee. One of the employees told me not to worry about it and paid for my coffee which was $6. Huge thanks to that employee and for their kindness.
bad_review_summary: The one girl taking orders was really friendly and nice, but the lady doing drive thru wouldn‚Äôt even acknowledge us when we tried to ask for ketchup, straight up ignored my husband. The girl running the drive through lane this morning (Monday at 9:45) needs to learn basic customer service and manners. The hash brown bowl was 1/3 full and no fork was included in the bag.

name: Dunkin'
good_review_summary: The Sunday morning crew are awesome! They‚Äôre always upbeat and friendly even though I‚Äôm always there not long after they open. My order is always hot and ready when I pull up to the window. The people that work here are always very very nice! You have a fantastic, hardworking staff!
bad_review_summary: i just wanted my favorite coffee from my local hampton cove dunkin this friday morning and this rude elderly woman was very unkind and forget my caramel drizzle on my coffee. when i asked for a toasted bagel that was would make since that i wanted it with cream cheese she but instead she just throw a very burnt, tiny bagel into a bag with no cream cheese or knife. there is service is god aweful and if there was a star to rank them

name: Dunkin'
good_review_summary: Mrs. Fathizadeh at The University of Alabama in Huntsville provided exceptional service. Her professionalism, unwavering passion, and consistently warm demeanor were truly commendable.
bad_review_summary: This location is comically bad. I came twice a week for a semester, and ordered the same drink pretty much every time. Hash browns were also stale and cold. Typical capitalist mindset. No pride of ownership.

name: Dunkin Cemetery
good_review_summary: No good reviews available.
bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Dunkin's Painting-Wallpapering
good_review_summary: No good reviews available.
bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Kay Donuts
good_review_summary: All the doughnuts I‚Äôve tried here have been delicious! My favorite are the cinnamon! It‚Äôs a great Iocal shop with such variety. The prices are amazing. Give them a try!
bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Krispy Kreme
good_review_summary: No good reviews available.
bad_review_summary: I always have loved their doughnuts,  but will have to find another place to go. Ordered the Valentines Box of Flowers to be delivered and they were awful. Missing the types advertised, lazy and none of the pretty decorations advertised. Sad dried up plain donuts that look like a lazy person couldn't be bothered enough to do a good job on.

name: Dutch Bros Coffee
good_review_summary: Dutch Bros has great tasting coffee and the staff are always pleasant and nice. The only issue with this location is the number of employees on duty. Having 2 people making drinks and 1 person taking drive thru orders during lunch time is a terrible idea. Stop being cheap (if this is the reason why only 3 people are working) and hire more people to work during your busiest hours.
bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Dutch Bros Coffee
good_review_summary: This location is super convenient in Huntsville right across from UAH on University drive. We truly missed the west coast desert coffees but this is such a nice treat. Download their mobile app to earn rewards!
bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: PIPER AND LEAF Tea & Coffee Shop
good_review_summary: Piper and Leaf is such a gem! I've gotten use to going to the Lowe Mill location but came to the Constitution Park location today for their Garden Party! Such a lovely event! You can do no wrong stopping at any of the locations.
bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Beverage Depot Spirits
good_review_summary: Cute little store. Nice employees and selection. Barton's gin- plesantly dry, light floral after taste. Jim beam vanilla- smooth, good for the holidays. Peach amsterdam- like flavored water for non drinkers.
bad_review_summary: Gave the worker $30 in cash. And the remaining balance was supposed to go on my card. But instead she charged my card $30 and took my $30 cash.

name: Vices Beverages at South Parkway
good_review_summary: This store also has an excellent supply of home brewing equipment. They have kits for first time brewers and ingredients that experienced brewers need. Live yeast is kept in a refrigerator. The staff is knowledgeable and helpful.
bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Circle K Gas
good_review_summary: This place is a quick stop for grabbing snacks, getting gas, and heading back out. There's about 4 or so pumps available and it's a neat, little space that you can enter in where you will find a clerk working behind the register. You can always count on them to be open.
bad_review_summary: Third time I have stopped at this store and bathroom is never open, Not Convenient at all! "Not Convenient" is the word I use to describe this store.

name: Tous Les Jours
good_review_summary: 10/10 red bean buns, sweet soft bread, and their savory treats are a must-have. I'm in love with the curry and kimchi croquettes. The staff are so friendly and welcoming.
bad_review_summary: The croissants were soggy and didn't taste fresh at all. They offered to fix it, but it was late for me so I just took it. Honestly, I came here for good pastries.

name: The Foundation Coffeehouse
address: 4701 Meridian St N Suite K, Huntsville
good_review_summary: The food is delicious and well worth it they‚Äôre a little pricey but you get what you pay for! They have discontinued, the coffee, shop, part of the business, but the food is amazing. Employees were sweet and knowledgeable, patient with us not knowing the menu differences between vegan and the other options. Coming back to town soon and will stop here every time now.
bad_review_summary: Closed? ‚Äî not a cafe ‚Äî appears to now be a venue rental space. Owners need to update business name, business category, hours, etc.

name: Scooter's Coffee
good_review_summary: Delightful coffee. The frozen blended ones always hit the spot when you feel like rewarding yourself a little. Great quick service with a smile too. Highly recommend.
bad_review_summary: I ordered a medium Americano with two extra shots and extra ice. When I received my Americano, it was very clear and had very little espresso at all. On top of that, they refused to take the first one back even though it was complete garbage. They don't even have a way to contact them or explain this issue on their website.

name: Mudslingers Drive-Thru Coffee
good_review_summary: Mudslingers is a drive through coffee shop on the side of the road. The owners and staff are genuinely just nice people. If you want an amazing cup of coffee with great service, stop by.
bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: White Bison Coffee
good_review_summary: Best coffee in this area and much more affordable than driving further for a local coffee shop. Twice I‚Äôve gotten lattes here and both times were great coffee and great service!
bad_review_summary: Waited 45mins for a curbside order. They initially called when I first arrived to ask to substitute an out of stock item. After I gave up and went in staff first ignored me for 5mins. I declined the offer of cold food and drinks.

name: Hungry Howie's Pizza
google_good_review_summary: The food looks as good as the pictures and tastes even better than you hope for the incredibly good prices. The salads are impressive and well priced. The dining room is too much yellow for me to feel comfortable. Long wait time and they shorted me on vegetables.
google_bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Five Star Pizza
google_good_review_summary: Get the garlic crust! And know that a Piezilla will feed 5 or 6 HUNGRY people. There was a glitch in my order and they called me to make sure they got it right!
google_bad_review_summary: Five Star used to be EXCELLENT. Lately however, it's like the pizza dough is soaked in water before throwing it in the box. It's so wet, the bottom of the box is literally falling apart by the time I get it... which is pretty quick. Will anyone do anything to remedy this or, like most things these days, am I wasting my breath saying anything at all?

name: Royal Pizza Plus
google_good_review_summary: The pizza itself was fantastic, but the real surprise was the wings ‚Äì absolutely divine. A perfect harmony of flavors and textures. A must-visit for pizza lovers seeking something extraordinary.
google_bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Mega's Pizza
google_good_review_summary: The food was amazing, the turkey salad was enough for two and delicious. The owners were as nice as could be, professional and polite. Received food very quickly after ordering. Restaurant was very clean. Loved this place.
google_bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Domino's Pizza
google_good_review_summary: I had a great experience with Domino‚Äôs Pizza! Ordering online was fast and simple, and I was ready on time. I also appreciated the variety of menu options, from the cheesy bread to the specialty pizzas.
google_bad_review_summary: This location used to be amazing. I always got my order within 30min, steaming hot. App tells you 20min for delivery then the tracker sits in prep for 1 hrs. Pizza is finally done but sits for another 30min before it's out for delivery. Charge people 10 cents for packets of Parmesan and red hot flakes.

name: CUBAN PIZZERIA
google_good_review_summary: The staff was polite and patient while our daughter practiced her Spanish. Pizza was good and cheezy, they make a thicker style pizza like a deep dish from Pizza Hut.
google_bad_review_summary: This is not how cuban pizza is supposed to taste. I don't think the pizza was made when I was there. It tasted as if it was pre-made. Pizza hut is better.

name: Hungry Howie's Pizza & Subs
google_good_review_summary: Pizza was delicious worth 30$ not in my opinion will be back for the deals great employee Zachary H was kind a respectful young man thanks again hungry howie for a delicious pizza.
google_bad_review_summary: The food was so disgusting it was almost inedible. After three bites I couldn't eat anymore and just went straight to the crust. I've never ordered the Howie bread before so i'm not sure how they intended it to be.

name: Domino's Pizza
google_good_review_summary: Place not found.
google_bad_review_summary: Place not found.

name: Little Caesars Pizza
google_good_review_summary: Outstanding, I like to drop in every once in a while, and get a quick bite, I get the little poppers, the 4  four under 5 bucks. Services quick, and easy, very painless. Food is always delicious. Clean environment, management put together a  good team, they had no problem keeping business.
google_bad_review_summary: This location is hopeless. This place is HORRIBLE!! I ordered 3 pizzas through the drive thru and after 30 minutes of waiting had to go inside to figure out where my food was. It took another 8 minutes of the employees talking to eachother in the back and walking around laughing together before I finally had to call out to someone to get their attention. Then they try to give me 1 decent pizza... 1 wrong pizza... and 1 that had a pile of grease in the

name: Domino's Pizza
google_good_review_summary: No good reviews available.
google_bad_review_summary: When I tried to use the make it right option on the app, it offered me points enough for a 2 topping pizza not a deluxe. I ordered a medium deluxe and had one half pepperoni and the other half deluxe as the menu has it. The receipt has it correct, but You sent me a Pepperoni only pizza.

name: Carmines Pie House
google_good_review_summary: Carmine's Pie House is a local gem for a quality Italian pizza experience. Outstanding Deep Dish and Even Better Hospitality! Service members and Veterans get first free round of beers on the house!!!
google_bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Little Caesars Pizza
google_good_review_summary: Best little Caesars I've ever had. I ordered 3 pizzas with extra sauce and got extra everything. They know how to make good pizza here and plan to keep in business. I'll be ordering here for now on.
google_bad_review_summary: The fact is they just don't know how to make pizza. They don't make the dough right or they don't cook it right. Just gross.

name: Marco's Pizza
google_good_review_summary: Marco‚Äôs gained a new customer. The food is always on point and we have tried several things! We love the pizza, salad, and wings the most.
google_bad_review_summary: This is how my pizza looked when I received it. I order from this place all the time and my pizza never looked like this. It‚Äôs sad I got to give them a 1 star today. It did not taste right or looked good.

name: Pizza Hut
google_good_review_summary: Ordered a pie from this place last night. I went through door dash due to the fact I am now out of Hut's delivery zone. It was very fresh and very good.. I could not have been happier.
google_bad_review_summary: This was by far the WORST experience i‚Äôve had with PizzaHut. Pizza tasted like old pizza heated up and stale with barely any cheese on it. As long as they use door dash for delivery I am done.

name: Leo's Pizza Italiano
google_good_review_summary: Leo's Pizza Italiano was the place of my fianc√© and I's "official" first date. I highly recommend the pizza most especially! The staff is so kind and accommodating and they truly make Leo's what it is today.
google_bad_review_summary: I saw reviews and was excited. Actual visit was pretty bad. Waited about 5 minutes for food when I got there which I didn't mind. Nothing we ordered looked anything like what I had seen in the past.

name: Little Caesars Pizza
google_good_review_summary: Everytime I come here it gets better & better ! Cashiers are nice very thoughtful! My kids love lil Caesar‚Äôs! Food is always freshhhh and so delicious I ordered online and ordered a stuffed crust cheese pizza and they gave me pepperoni and we don't eat pepperoni due to religious purposes.
google_bad_review_summary: Ordered pizza puffs online and they were over cooked and very premature! No one apologized nor even asked if I wanted a remake. There was no management present at all.

name: Pizza Hut
google_good_review_summary: This is by far my favorite location. The associates are always nice and attentive. If you arrive early, they might even put you at the front of the 'making it' line.
google_bad_review_summary: The pizza was dry, overcooked, barely any sauce or cheese. The boneless wings are just the frozen ones heated up. I order through the Pizza Hut app to avoid door dash and get they had door dash deliver the food still, with no security wrapping or anything sealing the food secure.

name: Pizza Hut
google_good_review_summary: Placed the order online, the pizzs was made to perfection. Fresh out the oven on arrival. Special thanks Jason and Tony!!AAA pizza this is better than the brick oven mama and pop stores!!! Will only come back here!!
google_bad_review_summary: This location sent the wrong pizza to a disabled person and then told her that she had to get her money back from the DoorDash. The staff and manager was rude and kept placing her on hold and then just started laying the phone down when she kept calling back. This location is usually pretty good but it's gone downhill lately.

name: Pizza Hut
google_good_review_summary: Best pizza I‚Äôve ever had in my life. So quick, fresh, and hot everytime. Erica has done great things to this store & it just gets better everytime we go!!
google_bad_review_summary: I've tried to order from this pizza hut. And it's just garbage management sucks, nobody knows what they're doing! So i'm taking my business somewhere else. If any pizza hut at all, considering there's none close to my house.

name: Howieluv's pizza wings and subs
google_good_review_summary: Howieluvs has exceeded my expectations. Everything we ordered was spot on. Food didn‚Äôt take very long roughly 20 min, which we were told ahead of time. Very nice and friendly owner! The chicken tenders are soo big! The pizza was so yummy.
google_bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Live Oak Pizza
google_good_review_summary: The staff are so warm and attentive, making you feel right at home. The decor is stylish yet cozy‚Äîperfect for a relaxed meal. The food is all fresh and made to order!
google_bad_review_summary: This pizza appeared to be frozen grocery store pizza. The pizza sauce tasted like spaghettios. Wings ok. Ordered large supreme, small cheese, and 10 wings, 65$ delivery through restaurant.

name: Stoner's Pizza Joint Jacksonville Southside
google_good_review_summary: The pepperoni pizza is authentic and delicious. My new favorite is buffalo/ BBQ chicken pizza so so good. The breadsticks that looked like blunts were hilarious.
google_bad_review_summary: I ordered pep and Rollie on Uber eats very disappointed. These should‚Äôve been baked in the pizza pan, but instead they baked everything onto aluminum foil and put it through the oven. This is not the proper way to bake or serve food on aluminum foil, which will stick to the food.

name: Rodrigo's Craft Pizza
google_good_review_summary: Place not found.
google_bad_review_summary: Place not found.

name: Ciao Trattoria Italiana
google_good_review_summary: The Cheesesteak sub was perfectly toasted and generously filled with meat. Owner really pleasant and friendly. Reasonable price and lots of food. Will be back!!
google_bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Moon River Pizza
google_good_review_summary: The pizza was probably some of the best pizza I've ever had. The crust and underside was perfectly crisp and not overcooked. The atmosphere was nice and clean and a little retro.
google_bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Crispy's Springfield Gallery
google_good_review_summary: The Asian wings are fantastic and a must try for all wing lovers!! I ordered "The Silver" pizza - Gorgonzola Cheese, Goat Cheese, Mozzarella Cheese & Roasted Garlic White Sauce Topped with Rosemary & Truffle Oil. The pizza looked good other than the burnt, bubbled up parts on top.
google_bad_review_summary: Not impressed for the price or by the customer service. If you want quality pizza and service I would recommend Joesph's Pizza. I ONLY recommend this place as a hang out to drink beer with a bartender that has better sense of customer service than I received.

name: Wood Fired Up Pizza
google_good_review_summary: Fired Up has our second favorite pizza in town! I love the Pretzel, their beer cheese is to die for!! I've never had a bad meal from here and highly recommend checking them out.
google_bad_review_summary: The bar worker chic was horrible today. She finally acknowledged us an said im the only one here taking care of a large table and said you can go to counter to order.Mind you they already had their food when we sat down. There was no reason to treat us in that manner.

name: Joseph's Pizza on Main St
google_good_review_summary: Joseph‚Äôs Pizza has been a landmark restaurant for decades. The food is very good overall, but a bit pricey for the portion sizes. The homemade bread was some of the best I‚Äôve had.
google_bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Casa Dora Italian Cusine & Pizzeria
google_good_review_summary: The best Italian food I have had yet since 2014. The owners and staff are All attentive and very customer service savvy. The food was delicious. Definitely delft like I was back in NYC.
google_bad_review_summary: My cousin recently dined at this Italian restaurant while on a business trip. He was horrified to discover roaches in his pasta. It's clear that this establishment has a serious roach infestation problem.

name: Uncle Charlie's Sandwiches Inc.
google_good_review_summary: Consistency is key, and Uncle Charlie's delivers every time. Price was excellent, especially for the portion size. Service is always friendly.
google_bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Ale Pie House
google_good_review_summary: The Ale House Salad was great with cheese and olives. The tomatoes were a bit over ripe, and some lettuce was not as fresh as it could've been. We ordered Chicago Style pizza and it was absolutely delicious.
google_bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Pizza Dynamo
google_good_review_summary: Pizza Dynamo's pizza-by-the-slice is perfect for when you are craving something quick but delicious. The crust is that ideal balance of crispy and chewy, the sauce flavorful without being overpowering, and the topping combos are creative without trying too hard.
google_bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Electric Dough Pizza Co.
google_good_review_summary: The laid-back vibe and super friendly service definitely made the visit worthwhile. The only knock I will give it is for the chairs at the tables. It is a combination of booth and chairs which is great. The chairs though are declined at a weird pitch for dining.
google_bad_review_summary: $60 for a medium pizza which was a small by any other standard, chef salad in a to go box, frozen tiny meatballs with motz. All sauce was store bought as well. Waste of money, food and service was awful.

name: Marco's Pizza
google_good_review_summary: The owners and staff are invested in the quality of their food and their service. The employees at my office consistently ask me to get lunch from this shop. There are several Marcos Pizza shops in Jacksonville and more are opening.
google_bad_review_summary: We will not be ordering from this location ever again. Ordered a half and half pizza and everything was plopped in the middle and cooked onto the entire pizza. The store does not appear on the list on Marco's comment website.

name: Joe Baba Pizzeria
google_good_review_summary: Pizza did not disappoint. Crust was thin, but traveled well. Toppings were good. 10/10, would buy it again.
google_bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: V Pizza + Sidecar - San Marco
google_good_review_summary: The wings are a 100 out of 10 seriously the best wings I‚Äôve ever had. Pizza was good and reasonably priced. Staff were very friendly.
google_bad_review_summary: Pizza was extremely soupy and wet. Even after letting it cool it didn‚Äôt not take form and was unpleasant to eat. Each of us ordered a pizza and my friend‚Äôs pizza did not come until after everyone else finished.

name: Biggies Pizza 5 Points Riverside
google_good_review_summary: I love this place because they always have a variety of slices that are fresh and super tasty. Staff is always super chill too Lizzie & Evan are 10/10 , they deserve a raise asap ! Informative , knowledgeable, and kind.
google_bad_review_summary: "I‚Äôve had biggies pizza in the past and we loved it but today was such a waste of $100.00 firstly the wings were so dry supposed to be buffalo and wet but sadly they had no sauce" "I ended up making a cheap pack of ramen and it was much better"

name: Al's Pizza
google_good_review_summary: This was my first time at this location. I decided to have the stuffed shells. They were very good. They have a nice appetizer list that will fill you up.
google_bad_review_summary: I don't know if they are under new management, but the pizza does not taste the same as it use to. I ordered two pizzas and it barely had cheese and tomato sauce on it. So won‚Äôt be coming back just a waste of money. Not what it used to be. Sad.

name: Mateo's
google_good_review_summary: The stand-out winner of all the dishes was the chicken taco, totally amazing!!! The mac n cheese bites were addictive and good but were heavy and greasy. Cheese steak was full of cheese and had a good cook, but it was not my favorite dish.
google_bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Rino's Pizza
google_good_review_summary: Great food. Nice little place, very large servings. They always give you a little something extra. I've been there several time. & had the Chicken Cacciatore, Pizza, Fettucine Alfredo.
google_bad_review_summary: Food was so-so. Dead bugs on the table. No offer to clean. We sanitized the table and it had dirt all over it. AC apparently not working.

name: Napolis Pizza Cuisine
google_good_review_summary: Napolis is reliable for good Italian food at a reasonable price. The food always arrives hot and properly packaged when I order from them. They are family owned, Maurice, Nora and their son, Jose.
google_bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Rojas Pizza

name: Celeno‚Äôs Bistro
google_good_review_summary: Place not found.

name: Domino's Pizza

name: Domino's Pizza
google_good_review_summary: No good reviews available.

The driver then took around half an hour give or take to drive 3 miles. I will not be spending any more money with this Domino's location.

name: Domino's Pizza
google_good_review_summary: I ordered a 2 TOPPING MEDIUM SIZE PIZZA. WITH JALAPE√ëOS & TOMATOES. The pizza was very well prepared, by a hard working team of pizza pros. I highly respect that they make my pizza exactly the way I order it.
google_bad_review_summary: Do not order from this store. They take over an hour to even get your food in the oven. This is the second time I have been waiting 2 hours and still haven't received my food. Worst pizza delivery experience ever.

name: Domino's Pizza
google_good_review_summary: No good reviews available.

I ordered a medium deluxe and had one half pepperoni and the other half deluxe as the menu has it. The receipt has it correct, but You sent me a Pepperoni only pizza.

name: Pizza Hut
google_good_review_summary: The pizza was well made and very tasty. The thin crust had a good amount of toppings. The cheese pizza was the perfect amount before. The driver forgot our 2 liters.

name: Papa Johns Pizza

He added there garlic sauce a charge of 99 cents and 2 packs of Parmesan cheese which is 50 cents each, they were free in the past.

I was ordering a stuffed crust pepperoni pizza and he turned the screen around and kept pointing at a pretzel crust pizza. Just an all around bad experience This place WAS amazing and so WAS the employees.

name: Papa Johns Pizza
google_good_review_summary: I love this place... Cheap deals... Especially if you have the app.... Carry out is cheaper of course but if you gotta order then for the most pay right in time every time. Great staff inside... Working hard not too social but stay hard at it... Respect lol .. Great Pizza!!!!

name: Papa Johns Pizza
google_good_review_summary: No good reviews available.

They also left it outside once with no phone call and ants were all over it. I refuse to order pizza from Papa John‚Äôs anymore.

name: Papa Johns Pizza
google_good_review_summary: Two out of the three pizzas were great! I was disappointed about the meat one. The wings are amazing and super juicy with the right amount of sauce. Never order the pizza with Alfredo/thin crust/banana peppers/chicken/pineapples those all together were terrible.
google_bad_review_summary: The delivery driver canceled my order and stole my pizza. When calling the store the ‚Äúmanager‚Äù Joe was very nonchalant about the entire situation. Extremely upset about the service. I do expect my refund! I will no longer be ordering papa johns pizza for my family.

name: Papa Johns Pizza
google_good_review_summary: Christina took such good care of us. A shining example of what customer service is all about. The pizza was absolutely amazing. I loved the taste. Would definitely go back.
google_bad_review_summary: My pizza came completely messed up and uneatable for the second time in a row. I am trying to feed my hungry daughter and I can't even give her this. Will not be coming back. The general manager Rick fixed the problem but this is still unacceptable.

name: Papa Johns Pizza
google_good_review_summary: No good reviews available.

The last time I went they didn't give me stuffed crust which I had paid for and the store literally smelled like someone crapped themselves. I would not recommend anyone getting food here it is always dry, barely any toppings, and incredible rude and slow service. This was the worst experience ever.

name: Pizza Hut
google_good_review_summary: I hate menu is not listed and they can't bother to have printed menus. Also hate you can't get traditional garlic parm wings with meal. A+ to these 2 employees for making the Dominos name superior.
google_bad_review_summary: I ordered a pizza, cinnamon sticks, and wings. When I got there, the employee told me that they didn‚Äôt have the pizza I ordered so he has to make it from scratch. He made the pizza and must have realized that I also ordered wings. He then made the wings. I checked my food and I‚Äôd received cinnamon rolls instead of the cinnamon sticks. He had to make that as well. Overall, it took about 40 minutes for him to completely

name: Pizza Hut
google_good_review_summary: I ordered the new pull apart pizza and it was amazing! It comes with 3 different ranch dips and I also got the Cinnabon cinnamon rolls! Delicious! All of the employees were very professional and friendly!
google_bad_review_summary: Pizza Hut is a local business, but their customer service is terrible. I had to abandon my order after being ignored for far too long. Strongly recommend against paying in advance.

name: Pizza Hut
google_good_review_summary: No good reviews available.
google_bad_review_summary: My Hut in Jacksonville, Florida has been criticized for poor customer service. Customers have complained about the food, service, and price of the pizzas. One customer said the pizza was covered in mushrooms.

name: Little Caesars Pizza
google_good_review_summary: Amir is professional, friendly, and patient. You could tell he genuinely cares about the customer experience. Throughout the whole store, everyone was polite, attentive, and worked together.
google_bad_review_summary: Only received 2 of the 3 items I ordered, and food was ICE COLD. Every time I come to the store on Wilson there is a wait usually 20minutes or so today it has taken about 45 minutes to get two pizzas . This is ridiculous and it‚Äôs only getting worse.

name: Papa Murphy's | Pizza
google_good_review_summary: It was easy to order; arrived in a reasonable amount of time; was delivered by a courteous employee; included easy to follow baking instructions, and tasted great. This was a great time saver on a busy evening and made clean up a breeze! If you want fresh, never frozen ingredients that are generously LOADED onto the pizza, and you prefer to save money by cooking yourself, this is the best take and bake there is.
google_bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Mellow Mushroom Jacksonville - Town Center
google_good_review_summary: Mellow Mushroom is known for its hand-tossed, stone-baked pizzas, an eclectic, psychedelic-meets-boho decor style, and a menu that leans into bold flavors and creative toppings. The Holy Shiitake Pie is an absolute must-order.
google_bad_review_summary: After almost 2 hours, they still only brought out 2 of our 4 pizzas. The staff had excuse after excuse, and relayed those false excuses to their manager. The restaurant wasn't even full or exceptionally busy. They need retraining and whatever other corrective action and penalties that may be applicable.

name: Mellow Mushroom Jacksonville - Avondale
google_good_review_summary: The service was top-notch, the food was good, and the atmosphere was perfect for our group. Heather is an outstanding bartender! She's incredibly fast, friendly, and always on top of everything, even when the bar is packed.
google_bad_review_summary: The meat was absolutely boring, soggy, grey in color. The bottom of the deceptively oversized bun is wet as a sponge. The tater tot side is pathetic.

name: Pie Bar
google_good_review_summary: The newly opened spot is on the main square in Jacksonville, an easy ride from the trail. The draft house is self serve with the high tech pouring system, it is great for tasting the wide variety of beer, wine and ciders on tap. The atmosphere was laid back with some games, pool table and corn hole.
google_bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Norikase - Modern Japanese Omakase & Sushi
google_good_review_summary: Norikase is a true culinary gem. Every dish was bursting with flavor from the perfectly executed sushi to the rich, delicate omakase courses. The fish was incredibly fresh, the textures and seasoning on point. The staff made the experience seamless, and the cocktails were creative and delicious.
google_bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Solune Coffee
google_good_review_summary: The monthly night market at Solune is the most chill & welcoming arts market environment I could have hoped for. They roast all their beans in-house. Their Guatemalan has been a staple in my home since I found them.
google_bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: flamingo coffee
google_good_review_summary: Flamingo Coffee is one of Jacksonville's top spots for coffee. The quality of their beans is consistently exceptional. The staff is knowledgeable, friendly, and always willing to go the extra mile.
google_bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Social Grounds Coffee Roasters
google_good_review_summary: Great atmosphere and service! Coffee was so good!! Yum! I had hot latte with one pump of lavender syrup. So so good. Great spot for studying. Great sport to hang. They have a couch perfect for a coffee date.
google_bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Ellianos Coffee
google_good_review_summary: I love Ellianos! I have been to a few different locations. They are always super polite when taking the order. If there is a long line, they usually do like Chick-fil-A style ordering (which I love)!
google_bad_review_summary: I have been getting this drink for 3 years ( even when it's off menu) . It is always amazing. Yesterday I ordered it. By the time I took my first sip I was pretty far away. I don't know if they forgot to put the banana in but it was definitely not drinkable.

name: Bold Bean Coffee Roasters - Riverside
google_good_review_summary: Best coffee I've had in Jacksonville! The El Salvador Gesha was super nice! Floral and tea like. The barista was really cool as well, chatting about the coffee with me. Can't ask for more in a specialty shop.
google_bad_review_summary: I use to love this place, but I can never get flavor in my latte tho I ask every time. And adding vanilla after the espresso touched milk is a coffee fumble. Then look at this, today i get the pleasure of added bean grinding a in my cup.

name: Biggby Coffee
google_good_review_summary: Had a perfect drive thru coffee experience at this shop! The customer service was phenomenal and the coffee was so so good. I also tried the donut holes and loved them. Would recommend them and definitely going back.
google_bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Old Cup Cafe
google_good_review_summary: The owners were very friendly, helpful and beyond accommodating! Overall amazing people to do business with or just to have a friendly conversation! Wonderful family-operated business! You just got yourself a happily returning customer!
google_bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Ellianos Coffee Company
google_good_review_summary: Yelp reviewers often remark how efficient and friendly the staff are, even during busy morning rushes. The staff is extremely polite and friendly. They are always smiling and provide some of the best tasting coffee.
google_bad_review_summary: I went to Ellianos this morning craving grits and a sandwich for lunch. The drive thru was short and the service was quick. Unfortunately, when I got to work, ready to eat, I found the sandwich I was looking forward to having for lunch had a long sting of hair outside the wrapper. Not even mine.

name: Brass Tacks Coffee Co.
google_good_review_summary: Make sure not to park anywhere directly in front of the coffee shop. The drive-thru line of cars, that's right next to the shop with no outlet, blocks you from leaving if you are trying to get out.
google_bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Foxtail Coffee Co & Kelly‚Äôs Ice Cream - San Marco
google_good_review_summary: Foxtail is located next to Publix in San Marco, Florida. The Blackberry Chantilly Latte was really good. The turkey, ham & cheese sandwich on a pretzel bun was salty.
google_bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Red Owl Coffee Company
google_good_review_summary: Moon and Ava were absolute dolls, just so sweet and helpful. The building used to be a car wash! I think it‚Äôs super cool what they‚Äôve done to the place.
google_bad_review_summary: The amount of cream cheese was criminal. The middle bagel well was partially filled in with almost none spread on the bagel itself. The coffee was fine, and the breakfast sandwich was decent, but I'll definitely pass on this place in the future.

name: Spruce
google_good_review_summary: Spruce is one of the coolest spots I've been to in a long time. A warm, welcoming atmosphere paired with friendly service makes this place truly special. A must-visit for plant lovers, beer enthusiasts and wine connoisseurs alike.
google_bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Southern Grounds & Co.
google_good_review_summary: Southern Grounds & Co. is a great place to have coffee and get some work done on your laptop. Employees are kind and hospitable, especially Kat who has taken time to chat with us about life. The food and desserts are deliciously unique.
google_bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Southern Grounds & Co.
google_good_review_summary: Southern Grounds is a coffee shop on the outskirts of San Marco, convenient to downtown and next to railroad tracks that somehow gives it a uniquely Jacksonville feeling. Fresh food and unique seasonal coffee and other drinks are a feature of this local establishment.
google_bad_review_summary: No bad reviews available.

name: Screaming Cat Ice Cream & Coffee

name: Kava & Company - San Marco

name: Dunkin'

I asked for a spoon to take the whipped cream off and she grabbed my drink off the counter, rolling her eyes, and threw the top of my drink in the trash. I just left. Why be so incredibly rude when I‚Äôm paying for the add-on?

name: The Greenhouse Bar

name: Starbucks

name: Cafecito?

name: European Street Cafe

name: Starbucks

name: Starbucks
google_good_review_summary: The service continues to be one of the best in town. I had an excellent choice recommended by cashier Ice Brown Sugar Oatmilk Shaken Espresso with free foam 5/7 - 5/11 for free on Starbucks.
google_bad_review_summary: It was huge chucks of matcha in my drink. Absolutely horrible! Please take a time and prepare drinks correctly. Chunks of matchA is extremely bitter.

name: Starbucks
google_good_review_summary: The drive-thru moves fast and there's adequate parking. Easy access to bathrooms with no code. A lot of seating for people to work or study. Leather chairs on the side for small group conversations.
google_bad_review_summary: The first 3 times they filled my cup less than 3/4 of cup full and I would only notice because for some reason my Matcha is foamy only at this location. So this morning I try again after about a few weeks and I tell them to please ensure they fill my cup to the appropriate level and yes they did fill it up but with WHAT I do not know. And I only noticed when I drank it because it tasted like so kinda ginger spice or something and I

name: Starbucks
google_good_review_summary: I swear every time I go in and she sees me, this lady knows exactly what I want. Prices are too high now, and some of the newer locations are kind of bare bones compared to the past. But I consistently receive the exact same taste I order, so a win overall.
google_bad_review_summary: The new policy of having to buy something to get water at Starbucks is shocking to me. I will never come to this location ever again outside of being sick. I used to spending upwards of $400 a month here time to start buying my Starbucks from the grocery store and using my French press.

name: Starbucks
google_good_review_summary: This is my first time at this location & it is so beautiful. Tons of outside sitting and inside. Great location near a hotel so expect it to be a little busy.
google_bad_review_summary: I recently applied to work at a Starbucks and was told by a friend that its best if I give them a call just to have them be aware of my application due to many companies not actively checking the website. I called today and was calmly informing the barista that picked up the phone, she then suddenly cut me off mid sentence and told me ‚ÄúYou really shouldnt call about something like this on a Saturday at 5pm. Call on a Monday.‚Äù verbatim

name: Starbucks
google_good_review_summary: Iced Matcha Tea Latte made with soy milk. Healthy and tastes so good! Give this location and our favorite drink a try.
google_bad_review_summary: LZ Granderson is a writer who lives in New York City. He says he was shocked when he went to buy a cup of coffee at a coffee shop and was told he couldn't have it unless he paid for it with cash. Granderson: "I don't want to pay for it, I want it free"

name: Starbucks
google_good_review_summary: This location is perfect. The baristas always serve smiles and delicious drinks. The area is right next to the Memorial Park where you can stroll around after buying yourself a treat.
google_bad_review_summary: A psychiatric nurse practitioner wanted to make Starbucks Traveler Dark Roast apart of my meeting I facilitated for my team. When I went to pick it up it was being processed by a young man named Will. He demonstrated an inexperience for presentation when handing off a product. His attitude displayed irritation and he spoke to a lady right in front of me named Trish who said nothing, but shared in the irritation.

name: Starbucks
google_good_review_summary: No good reviews available.
google_bad_review_summary: The cashier is totally clueless and needs to be retrained! Ordering was like pulling teeth. Ironically she was of Asian descent and had no clue how to put together a Matcha latte. Her coworker saw her struggling and smirked. Why not help her?! This location is trash!

name: Starbucks
google_good_review_summary: I got my order fast, it was made correctly and fresh. I love the convenience of its location. My bagel was pretty good though.
google_bad_review_summary: I feel that if you work at a location in a hospital with family going through alot they should be a bit more polite. They are quick, but this location does not accept the barcode on app nor coupons sent to their actual app.

name: Dunkin'
google_good_review_summary: Dunkin has some of the best deals in their Mobile APP. Customer service was kind and food came quick. The egg wraps were decent nothing really to complain about.
google_bad_review_summary: The food was good and the wait time was ten minutes. There was not a greeting nor a tone of gratitude during my visit. Based on the service that was given, I will not recommend or visit anytime soon.

name: Dunkin'
google_good_review_summary: I always look forward to coming to coming here because I know I'm going to get great service each and every time. My go-to order is always a Blueberry donut. Although I've had issues with the hot chocolate being too hot, the staff is usually friendly and welcoming.
google_bad_review_summary: It was an extra $2 to get extra cream cheese like I originally asked for. If I have to check after people to do my order right, I‚Äôll just eat a bagel at home next time. My wife came here today and had to call me about how some ‚Äúregulars‚Äù (2 old men) had been berating her about how loud our children were that are less than 2 years old. Calling them animals and then calling my wife a tr

name: Dunkin'
google_good_review_summary: I go quite often to this dunkin and I can tell you the service is fabulous. I wish I remembered her name but a female from Hawaii who works is so respectful and sweet. If you can identify this woman, she needs a raise or if she‚Äôs not already should be in management and raise up employees like herself.
google_bad_review_summary: Hash-browns tasted like old grease‚Ä¶ the texture was too soggy. Breakfast sandwich was dry. I got their $6 meal and the croissant tasted stale.

name: Dunkin'
google_good_review_summary: This is absolutely the best Dunkin I have ever been to. It's the only one that I can stop at before work. And them not make me late, they are always fast, very polite and efficient.
google_bad_review_summary: The manager Violet yelled at me at the window and cursed at me. The payment had come out of my bank I showed confirmation and she continued to tell me that they didn't have the order. She stated she was the manager and all complaints can go through corporate office.

name: Dunkin'
google_good_review_summary: I LOVE this Dunkin! The people that they have working are AWESOME!!! They SPOIL ME!!! Y‚Äôall become a regular and let them spoil you too!!! TO THE WORKERS: Yeah are the BEST!!! Thank you for taking care of me every Monday-Friday @ lunch!
google_bad_review_summary: Took over 30 min to order food no one was watching the counter and those who seen the line just straight up ignored us. The drinks were bland and mostly water we had to remind them multiple times about our food.

name: Dunkin'
google_good_review_summary: Service was five star. We enjoyed our pistachio, hot and iced coffee. Would give a higher 5 star but 2 weeks have been out of Ground Beans. Will update if this changes.
google_bad_review_summary: This is the closest Dunkin for many of us that live on this side of town. It would be even better for us if there was better, more timely service at this location. The service here is inconsistent. coffee either completely burnt or they ran out of the machine and didn't check.

name: Dunkin'
google_good_review_summary: I feel like this store needs to get it together. I am at Dunkin everyday sometimes twice it's kind of a problem. Never go in its always drive through. If this is the one on University by Phillips gotta becareful.
google_bad_review_summary: The inside is pretty clean. There's lots of space and you can basically see all the workers. Service was slow. The donuts had surprisingly very little frosting on them. For it being newer, I expected better.

name: Dunkin'
google_good_review_summary: The food isn't great but as a dasher the people who run this establishment keep it going! The service is amazing and they are always so friendly, efficient and helpful. They serve my large hot French vanilla 4 creams, 3 sugars add whipped cream coffee well served. 10/10.
google_bad_review_summary: Ordered 2 sandwiches, 3 hash browns, 3 donuts and a regular large hot coffee, and a medium frozen coffee- only received the coffees and 2 plain donuts, and got refunded a mere 13$. Not only that but the frozen coffee was melted and the hot coffee was messy. Won't make that mistake agian.

name: Dunkin'
google_good_review_summary: Hire more people in this location. This place has not failed. They do need more staff to help out. Those that are there are doing a lot and go on beyond trying to make sure everyone leaves happy.
google_bad_review_summary: When it first opened, the staff was competent, efficient and friendly. Not so much now. I don't know if it has changed management but the staff is poorly trained and unsupervised.

name: Dunkin'
google_good_review_summary: "Love this location above all the other, it‚Äôs close to my job and they‚Äôre always fast and efficient," she said.
google_bad_review_summary: This store is the most nastiest store I have ever been to. While in there the managers were on there phone and employees were cussing and goofing off. I had to use the kiosk and repeatedly had to ask for parts of my order. While waiting I seen roaches crawling on the walls from the espresso machine.

name: Dunkin'
address: In Pilot Travel Center, 3515 Zoo Pkwy, Jacksonville
google_good_review_summary: Decent selection of snacks, drinks, hot or cold food. Few different options of coffee as well. The ladies behind the counter we kind & sweet, we even carried conversation for a few minutes.
google_bad_review_summary: Shane was shocked to encounter an employee openly smoking marijuana on the premises. When he asked for the employee's full name to report the incident properly, he refused to provide the full name, further demonstrating unprofessional conduct.

name: Dutch Bros Coffee
google_good_review_summary: Samantha was so friendly and helpful, she really went above and beyond to make sure I got exactly what I wanted. She helped me pick out a drink based on my preferences, and it was absolutely delicious! The whole vibe of Dutch Bros is just awesome, and Samantha totally embodies that positive energy.
google_bad_review_summary: The lemonade I ordered was fine, but the cranberry and orange muffin top was horrible. If I wanted something that wasn‚Äôt fresh, I would‚Äôve gone to the grocery store. Since tasty cake and little Debbie taste better than this, I will not be back.
